title: Ticket #4244: allow StarterLog.JobId instead of StarterLog.slotN
description:
It would be more meaningful to admins, and would facilitate the moving of jobs from slot to slot if the starter log extension was the job id rather than the slot name.

A new param will be added STARTER_LOG_NAME_APPEND, it will have a string expression relative to the slot ad that defines the extension for the StartLog. The value for this expression that will be compatible with 8.0.x behavior is 

    STARTER_LOG_NAME_APPEND = true

Permitted values for STARTER_LOG_NAME_APPEND are

  • true - same behavior as 8.0
  • false - append nothing, this is what 8.0 does for single slot machines
  • Slot - append slot name (this is what 8.0 does)
  • Cluster - append cluster id
  • Jobid - append job id

These are all case-insensitive keywords.

Cleanup of excess logs created by the use of Cluster or Jobid options will be handled in #4354. This second task may not be needed by CMS, and may be deferred.
remarks: Use of JobId, or Cluster for extension results in log files 'leaking' i.e. they are never deleted. While this may be OK for glide-in, it needs to be fixed for this feature to be generally useful.
